question: Who’s son was Hosea (Hos 1:1)?
What came to Hosea son of Beeri (Hos 1:1)?
All of the following were kings of Judah during Hosea’s time EXCEPT (Hos 1:1)?
Who was the king of Israel during Hosea’s time (Hos 1:1)?
What was the first things the Lord commanded Hosea to do (Hos 1:2)?
choice: Strike his staff on the gate three times
Tell Uzziah he needed to repent

question: Why was Hosea to marry an adulterous wife (Hos 1:2)?
choice: Because the land was adulterous departing from the Lord
Because Israel had rejected the Lord and wanted to go back to Egypt
Because the priests were adulterating the sacrifices
Because the temple of God’s presence had been defiled by the kings

question: Who did Hosea marry at the Lord’s command (Hos 1:3)?
Gomer was the daugther of ________ (Hos 1:3)
What was the name of Hosea’s first son (Hos 1:4)?
Who did Jezreel’s name represent a judgment on (Hos 1:4)?
Why was the house of Jehu king of Israel being judged (Hos 1:4)?
choice: Because of the massacre he did
Because of his oppression of the poor
Because he turned to the king of Aram

question: What would God do to Israel in the Valley of Jezreel (Hos 1:5)?
choice: Cause a drought in their land

question: Where would Israel’s bow be broken by God (Hos 1:5)?
What was Gomer’s first daughter named (Hos 1:6)?
What did Lo-Ruhamah’s name, Gomer’s first daughter, symbolize (Hos 1:6)?
choice: God would no longer show Israel love
God would judge Israel for not having compassion on the poor
God would lead Israel into a foreign land
God would send a drought on the land

question: How would God show the house of Judah love (Hos 1:7)?
choice: Saving them with bow and battle
Delivering them by the hand of their king
Saving them by the Lord their God
Saving them by the sword of Hosea

question: God said he was save Judah but not by any of the following means EXCEPT (Hos 1:7)
When did Gomer have her second son (Hos 1:8)?
choice: After she had repented and returned to Hosea
After she had burned Jezreel as a sacrifice

question: What did the name of Gomer’s second son Lo-Ammi mean (Hos 1:9)?
What did God say the Israelites would be like that could not be numbered (Hos 1:10)?
choice: The the sand on the seashore
Like the birds of the air
Like the stars of the heavens
Like the rocks of the desert

question: What would they be called in the place where it was said “you are not my people” (Hos 1:10)?
choice: You are the children of Abraham
You are the sons of the living God

question: What will happen to the people of Judah and Israel when they are called the sons of the living God (Hos 1:11)?
choice: They would inherit the promised land
They would see the Lord their God
They would return God with a whole heart

question: What day would result in Israel and Judah being reunited under one leader (Hos 1:11)?
Why does Hosea say “rebuke your mother” (Hos 2:2)?
choice: Because she is not his wife
Because she has rejected the ways of the Lord
Because she had rejected her children

question: What does Hosea say adulterous Israel should remove from between her breasts (Hos 2:2)?
God said if Israel does not remove the adulterous look from her face what will he do (Hos 2:3)?
choice: Send her away into exile from which she shall never return
Give her into the hands of her enemies
Strip her naked as the day she was born

question: God said if Israel does not remove the adulterous look from her face what will he do (Hos 2:3)?
choice: Send her out of the land
Send locusts to destroy her land

question: Why would God not show his love to Isreal’s children (Hos 2:4)?
choice: Because they have rebelled against him
Because they have run away from him
Because they have rejected his word
Because they are children of adultery

question: She (Israel) attributed all of the following to her lovers EXCEPT (Hos 2:5)
With what would God block Israel’s path (Hos 2:6)?
In what did her mother concieve her children (Hos 2:5)?

choice: The work of her own hands

question: Why did God say he would wall Israel in (Hos 2:6)?
choice: So she could not run after her lovers
So she would pay for the wrongs she had done
So she could not find her way
So she would turn back to him

question: Who will Israel chase after unsuccessfully (Hos 2:7)?
Why will Israel go back to her husband (Hos 2:7)?
choice: Because he would love her again
Because she was better off then
Because she desired to walk in his ways

question: What did Israel refuse to acknowledge (Hos 2:8)?
choice: That she had done anything wrong
That God had given her grain and oil
That God had pursued her with an everylasting love
That God would accept her back

question: What did God say he had given Israel all of the following even though she would not acknowledge it?

What had they used the gold and silver God had lavished on them for (Hos 2:8)?

choice: For her to dye in purple

question: What will God expose in front of her lovers (Hos 2:10)?

choice: She burned incense to the Baals

question: How did Israel deck herself for her lovers (Hos 2:13)?

choice: To a shaded grove of sycamore trees

question: What would God make a door of hope for Israel (Hos 2:15)?

choice: When they were fed with manna in the wilderness
On the day David was anointed king

question: In “that day” what would Israel call the Lord (Hos 2:16)?
In “that day” what would Israel NOT call the Lord (Hos 2:16)?

choice: The voice of want and need

question: In “that day” with whom would God make a covenant for Israel (Hos 2:18)?
choice: With the beasts of the field
With those who have led her astray

question: In “that day” God said he would banish all of the following from Israel EXCEPT (Hos 2:18)

choice: They will burn their idols with fire
They will praise the Lord their maker

question: How will God betroth Israel forever (Hos 2:19)?

choice: They will offer sacrifices is the Lord’s name
They will turn to the Lord

question: In “that day” what will response to the earth (Hos 2:21)?

choice: Put her by streams of water

question: What will do for the one called “Not my loved one” (Hos 2:23)?
choice: He will plant her in Zion
He will show his love to her

question: What will God call those he called “Not my people” (Hos 2:23)?

choice: God loved those who have rebelled against him
God has loved the whole world even though the world rejected him

question: What had the Israelites loved in their turning to other gods (Hos 3:1)?
choice: Their sacrifices of sheep and goats

Five pieces of gold and a basket of summer fruit

question: What requirement did Hosea put on Gomer when he bought her back (Hos 3:3)?

She must put on sackcloth and ashes of reprentance

question: Hosea says the Israelites will live without all of the following for may days EXCEPT (Hos 3:4)?

choice: The Lord their God and Moses his servant
The Lord their God and David their king

question: How will Israel approach God and his blessings in the last days (Hos 3:5)?

choice: A fickle stream that knows no bounds

choice: Because they had not followed the ways of the Lord
Because they had deserted the Lord

The idols of their foreign wives

Those who a blind and deaf

choice: They are made in his image

choice: A bear robbed of her cubs
